resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105878</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105878</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202643</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring the Food Guide Pyramid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen der Nahrungsmittelanleitung-Pyramide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorer la pyramide de guide de nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorando a pirâmide da guia do alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione della piramide della guida 
dell'alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερεύνηση της πυραμίδας οδηγών τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorar la pirámide de la guía del alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn the 6 groups of the Food Guide Pyramid. Students will become familiar with how foods are categorized within the Pyramid. Students will also become familiar with serving sizes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen die 6 Gruppen der 
Nahrungsmittelanleitung-Pyramide. Kursteilnehmer werden vertraut
mit, wie Nahrungsmittel innerhalb der Pyramide kategorisiert werden. 
Kursteilnehmer werden auch mit Umhüllunggrößen vertraut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront les 6 groupes de la 
pyramide de guide de nourriture. Les étudiants se 
familiariseront avec la façon dont des nourritures sont classées par
catégorie dans la pyramide. Les étudiants se familiariseront 
également avec des tailles de portion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão os 6 grupos da pirâmide
da guia do alimento. Os estudantes tornar-se-ão familiares com 
como os alimentos são categorizados dentro da pirâmide. Os 
estudantes tornar-se-ão também familiares com os tamanhos do 
serving.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno i 6 gruppi della piramide 
della guida dell'alimento. Gli allievi diventeranno esperti con 
come gli alimenti sono categorizzati all'interno della piramide. 
Gli allievi egualmente diventeranno esperti con i formati del 
serving.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τις 6 ομάδες της πυραμίδας 
οδηγών τροφίμων. Οι σπουδαστές θα γίνουν εξοικειωμένοι με 
το πώς τα τρόφιμα είναι ταξινομημένα μέσα στην πυραμίδα. 
Οι σπουδαστές θα γίνουν επίσης εξοικειωμένοι με την 
εξυπηρέτηση των μεγεθών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán los 6 grupos de la 
pirámide de la guía del alimento. Los estudiantes harán 
familiares con cómo los alimentos se categorizan dentro de la 
pirámide. Los estudiantes también harán familiares con tallas
de la porción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ELIZABETH CARSWELL
FN:ELIZABETH CARSWELL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105878</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/exploring-the-food-guide-pyramid</uri>

  </manifestation>
